title: Mac Client High CPU Usage after patch, unplayable
body: Hi, after the most recent patch, 7.3 I have been getting under 15 fps. I tried deleting the app and reinstalling and even tried the lol client self fix but found no luck. Could someone help me out or figure out a way to solve this issue? I did notice every time I turn league on, whether it be the patcher or the client, its CPU usage is way too high and slows down my computer overall.

replies.body: Im done Im switching to old client im lagging or not even moving sometimes in game i have El Capitan running even tho I have enough ram available ingame is unplayable lost 2 rank games in a row tried to quite and switch to old client but lost game realizing older client needs update too.

Mac FPS issues can be caused by a small handful of culprits. We've consolidated a list of common solutions in our [**Mac FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac), so I strongly recommend giving those steps a go.

Please let me know if this resolved the issue.
